notes: Excellent modern apartment with high-end finishes including polished tile floors, modern kitchen with built-in appliances, and luxury bathrooms with bathtubs and glass shower enclosures. Baby safety concerns include the decorative metal balcony railings which have climbable patterns, and the slippery polished floors. Abundant natural light through large floor-to-ceiling windows with city views from the 14th floor; the unit is unfurnished and in pristine condition.
